name: Crazy Cube Guy Combat
description:
[WIP]

[Meant for at least two people]

Joining the Game:

Hit 'f' or '/' to join the game, then use 'a' and 'd' or left and right arrow keys to change your hat/costume. Press 'f' or '/' again to ready up and start the game. Also if everyone is dead press 'r' to reload level.

Controls:

wasd for movement, f to shoot

arrow keys for movement, / to shoot

Power-ups:

Health and ammo are available.

Blue arrows make you faster.

Negative Effects for Other Players:

Pogo stick makes them constantly jumping

Circular arrows reverses their controls

Plus and minus sign makes their size grow and shrink

Visual Power-ups:

The balloon drops confetti and turns on the disco lights

Pill makes the scene very disorientating.

Also works with PS4 controllers,

X is shoot circle is jump

although the controller mapping is sometimes finicky.
